content: this legal text summarizes the progress of a legal case that took place in ghent on november 23 2017 the case involved two parties referred to as mb and me the court of appeal made determinations regarding the application of a new law on judicial divisions the court clarified that the new law should be immediately applicable to ongoing proceedings to expedite the process and ensure fair division certain provisions of the new law could be applied retroactively to cases initiated after april 1 2012 in this specific case the court found that article 1214 § 1 of the judicial code applied despite the appellants appeal the court upheld the judgment and charged the costs of the proceedings to the masses the case involved the division of assets of deceased individuals who were married in a community regime and had three children the court ordered a judicial liquidation division for the parental property and the estate of one of the deceased individuals the text also discusses another legal case involving two parties referred to as bm and em the case revolves around a partial agreement related to the allocation of fixed property elements and the determination of their value the agreement was drafted in february 2014 but was not formally implemented due to ems refusal to sign the accompanying notarial deed bm filed a claim in june 2015 to formalize and implement the agreement but it was declared inadmissible by the court in september 2016 bm appealed this decision and sought to reform the judgment the court of appeal heard the case in november 2017 and is now considering the appeal the text also discusses the application of new legislation regarding the procedure for judicial liquidation and distribution which came into force on april 1 2012 the text argues that the new law should be applied as soon as possible to avoid delays in cases related to judicial liquidation and distribution it explains that the new law can be applied to cases that were ordered before april 1 2012 but are still pending the text concludes by stating that the appeal of one of the parties is dismissed and the costs of the proceedings are charged to that party it also mentions the potential delay that parallel proceedings can cause in cases like this overall the text provides an overview of the legal process and the application of new laws in this specific case
